definition: on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)
individual/this/that/size/classifier for people or objects in general

sentences.english: The old bridge was last week .
sentences.chinese: 那座旧桥上个星期被拆除了。

sentences.english: He needs the specific dates their componets orders were placed last month.
sentences.chinese: 他要他们上个月提出的机件订单的详细日期。

sentences.english: When she was arrested at Notre Dame last month, he was right beside her.
sentences.chinese: 当她上个月在圣母大学被捕后，特里一直陪伴着她。

sentences.english: Last month I talked about how to write a device driver for radio-tuner cards.
sentences.chinese: 上个月我讲述了怎样为音频接收卡编写设备驱动。

sentences.english: Low water levels caused the country's largest hydropower dam to be shut down last month.
sentences.chinese: 上个月，低水位使得肯尼亚最大的水力大坝被迫关闭。

sentences.english: The friendly relationship between the two countries traces back to the last century.
sentences.chinese: 两国间的友好关系追溯到上个世纪。

sentences.english: I mean, in this last month, things have changed.
sentences.chinese: 因为上个月变革开始了。

sentences.english: He once again nosed ahead of me on the horse race last week.
sentences.chinese: 上个星期的马赛上，他又一次以微弱优势胜过了我。

sentences.english: Zhaolan was married to an actor last month.
sentences.chinese: 上个月赵兰和一个演员结婚了。

sentences.english: Last week, Quick kept his promise.
sentences.chinese: 上个星期，魁克实现了他的承诺。

sentences.english: That includes Shell, its chief executive said last month.
sentences.chinese: 这其中包括壳牌，其行政长官上个月说。

sentences.english: The little penguin was born last month - and was instantly ill-treated by its parents.
sentences.chinese: 这只小企鹅是在上个月出生的，刚落地就遭父母虐待。

sentences.english: After that, we went to a local garment shop, the one just opened last month.
sentences.chinese: 那之后，我们去了一家上个月刚开张的衣店。

sentences.english: They moved to Dallas two years ago and returned last month.
sentences.chinese: 他们两年前搬到达拉斯，上个月又搬回来了。

sentences.english: Again? We just had it serviced last month.
sentences.chinese: 又坏了？我们上个月才拿去修过。

sentences.english: I was having English class at this time last week.
sentences.chinese: 上个星期的这个时间我都在上英语课。

definition: only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
this/these/(commonly pr. [zhei4] before a classifier, esp. in Beijing)
